item.title: SEMCO Technologies 首次上市即大涨，成为法国最新上市的科技公司
item.description: 随着这家法国芯片制造设备供应商成为今年在法国首都上市的第二家科技公司，SEMCO 科技公司的股票周三在巴黎首次交易中大涨 41%。【原文：Shares of SEMCO Technologies surged 41% in their Paris trading debut on Wednesday, as the French chipmaking equipment supplier became the second technology company to be listed in the French capital this year.】

item.title: 欧洲央行警告关税之外的风险：从安全到资本流动
item.description: 欧洲央行首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩（Philip Lane）周三表示，欧洲央行在评估全球形势时将考虑贸易关税以外的风险，从安全问题到对外国投资者的潜在惩罚。【原文：The European Central Bank will consider risks beyond trade tariffs, from security concerns to potential penalties on foreign investors, when it assesses the global landscape, the ECB's chief economist Philip Lane said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 波兰将向欧盟举报马斯克的聊天机器人 "Grok "发表攻击性言论
item.description: 在埃隆-马斯克的 xAI 聊天机器人 Grok 对包括总理唐纳德-图斯克在内的波兰政治家发表攻击性言论后，波兰将向欧盟委员会举报该公司。【原文：Poland is going to report Elon Musk’s xAI to the European Commission after its chatbot Grok made offensive comments about Polish politicians, including Prime Minister Donald Tusk.】

item.title: 默克将以 100 亿美元收购维罗纳制药公司
item.description: 默克与维罗纳两家公司周三表示，默克将以约 100 亿美元的价格收购英国维罗纳制药公司（Verona Pharma），这将加强默克在呼吸系统治疗领域的实力，同时默克也在为其畅销抗癌药的专利到期做准备。【原文：Merck will buy UK-based Verona Pharma for about $10 billion, the companies said on Wednesday, strengthening the U.S. firm's presence in respiratory treatments as it readies for the patent expiry of its blockbuster cancer drug.】

item.title: 投资者等待关税最新消息，多伦多证券交易所期货走高
item.description: 与加拿大主要股指挂钩的期货周三走高，投资者正在关注贸易和关税方面的最新消息。【原文：Futures linked to Canada's main stock index edged higher on Wednesday with investors on the lookout for trade and tariff updates.】

item.title: 独家报道Arm公司预计自2021年起数据中心客户将增加14倍
item.description: 该公司告诉路透社，在数据中心使用基于Arm芯片的客户数量已增至7万家，自2021年以来增长了14倍。【原文：The number of customers that use Arm-based chips in data centers has grown to 70,000, a 14-fold increase since 2021, the company told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国 投资者的困境
item.description: 欧洲、中东和非洲地区金融和市场突发新闻记者 Alun John 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天。【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Alun John, EMEA Finance and Markets breaking news reporter.】

item.title: 美国最大的电网正努力满足人工智能的需求
item.description: 由于数据中心和人工智能聊天机器人的耗电速度超过了新建电厂的速度，美国最大的电网正处于紧张状态。【原文：America's largest power grid is under strain as data centers and AI chatbots consume power faster than new plants can be built.】

item.title: 迪拜阿联酋航空签署初步协议，将加密货币添加到支付中
item.description: 这家海湾航空公司的母公司周三在一份声明中说，阿联酋航空已与 Crypto.com 签署了一项初步协议，允许其客户通过该加密货币交易平台的支付服务付款。【原文：Emirates has signed a preliminary deal with Crypto.com that will allow its customers to make payments through the crypto trading platform's payment service, the Gulf carrier's parent company said in a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: 二十多位批评巴基斯坦政府的人士面临 YouTube 封禁
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的 YouTube 已告知二十多位批评巴基斯坦政府的人士，在当地法院以 "反国家 "为由要求封禁他们的频道后，该公司正在考虑封禁他们的频道。【原文：Alphabet-owned YouTube has told more than two dozen critics of the Pakistani government that it is considering blocking their channels after a local court sought to ban them for being "anti-state".】

item.title: 普睿司曼股价上涨，意大利电缆制造商被视为美国铜关税的赢家
item.description: 普睿司曼股价周三上涨多达 4%，原因是预计这家全球最大的电缆制造商在美国的大型业务将受益于美国对铜征收的关税，因为该公司在当地采购金属，应该能够将更高的价格转嫁给客户。【原文：Prysmian shares rose as much as 4% on Wednesday on expectations the world's largest cable maker's large U.S. business could benefit from U.S. tariffs on copper, as it sources the metal locally and should be able to pass on higher prices to customers.】

item.title: 华尔街期货在关税谈判和贸易动荡中上扬
item.description: 周三，美国股指期货微幅上扬，投资者在唐纳德-特朗普总统激进的关税举措的激流中游刃有余，并密切关注着与全球贸易伙伴的谈判。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged up on Wednesday, as investors navigated the currents of President Donald Trump's aggressive tariff moves and kept a close watch on negotiations with global trade partners.】

item.title: 加拿大企业在美国关税战期间实现贸易多元化，但专家认为这有局限性
item.description: 政府数据显示，加拿大企业正在加强与美国以外的盟国和较小市场的贸易，以最大限度地减少唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税带来的经济损失。【原文：Canadian companies are boosting trade with allies other than the U.S. and with smaller markets to minimize economic damage from President Donald Trump's tariffs, government data shows.】

item.title: 美联储会议纪要可能揭示关税和利率前景的分歧
item.description: 美联储 6 月 17 日至 18 日的政策会议纪要预计将于周三公布，会议纪要将显示，美联储内部意见不一，正在与美国提高进口税对经济的预期影响进行搏斗，在特朗普政府提高关税将在多大程度上加剧通胀变得更加明朗之前，美联储不愿承诺降息。【原文：The minutes from the Federal Reserve's June 17-18 policy meeting are expected on Wednesday to show a divided central bank wrestling with the expected economic impact of rising U.S. import taxes and reluctant to commit to interest rate cuts until it is clearer how much the Trump administration's tariff increases will add to inflation.】

item.title: 上任九个月，星巴克首席执行官面临扭亏为盈的艰巨任务
item.description: 星巴克首席执行官布莱恩-尼科尔（Brian Niccol）在华尔街赢得了 "奇迹创造者 "的美誉，他为塔可钟（Taco Bell）和奇波特尔（Chipotle）等受伤的餐饮品牌创造了奇迹。在星巴克上任九个月后，投资者不确定闪电是否会第三次降临。【原文：Starbucks CEO Brian Niccol earned a reputation on Wall Street as a miracle worker for wounded restaurant brands like Taco Bell and Chipotle. Nine months into his Starbucks tenure, investors are unsure if lightning will strike a third time.】

item.title: 投资者将迎来特朗普关税战下的首个美国盈利季度
item.description: 美国公司正准备打开第二季度的账本，投资者正在寻找美国总统唐纳德-特朗普 4 月 2 日发起的贸易战的影响迹象。【原文：U.S. companies are getting ready to open their books on the second quarter, with investors looking for signs of an impact from President Donald Trump's trade war launched on April 2.】

item.title: 消息人士称，马斯克的 "星链 "已获得印度监管部门的最终批准，可以进行发射
item.description: 三位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，Starlink 公司已获得印度航天监管机构颁发的在该国开展商业运营的许可证，为这家卫星供应商进入印度市场扫清了仅存的监管障碍。【原文：Starlink has received a license from India's space regulator to launch commercial operations in the country, clearing the only remaining regulatory hurdle for the satellite provider to enter the market, three sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，司法部就医疗保险计费行为对 UnitedHealth 前员工进行质询
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三援引知情人士的话报道，美国司法部的调查人员正在对联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）的前雇员进行询问，作为调查该公司医疗保险支付行为的一部分。【原文：Investigators from the U.S. Department of Justice are questioning former employees of UnitedHealth Group as part of a probe into the company's Medicare payment practices, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 资深立法者表示，欧盟正在推动美国尽早减免关税，并制定 "停滞 "条款
item.description: 欧洲议会贸易委员会主席周三表示，欧盟可能即将与美国达成一项贸易协定，但在争取立即减免关税和承诺不出台新措施方面举步维艰。【原文：The European Union may be nearing a trade agreement with the United States but is struggling to obtain immediate tariff relief and a commitment not to introduce new measures, the head of the European Parliament's trade committee said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国人减少海外旅行，美国政策影响航空燃油需求
item.description: 今明两年，随着中国人出国旅游的减少、美国严格的移民政策使一些游客望而却步，以及飞机机队燃油效率的提高，全球航空燃油需求的复苏将放缓并停滞在大流行前的水平之下。【原文：The recovery in global jet fuel demand is set to slow and stall below pre-pandemic levels this year and next as the Chinese travel abroad less, stringent U.S. immigration policies deter some tourists and aircraft fleets become more fuel-efficient.】

item.title: 英格兰银行认为全球紧张局势带来持续的金融稳定风险
item.description: 作者：戴维-米利肯和劳伦斯-怀特【原文：By David Milliken and Lawrence White】

item.title: 特拉通公司第二季度交付量略有增长，但美国关税带来压力
item.description: 德国卡车制造商特拉顿周三报告称，尽管美国进口关税的不确定性持续存在，但第二季度的交付量同比增长了 1%。【原文：German truck maker Traton reported on Wednesday a 1% increase in second-quarter deliveries year on year despite ongoing uncertainty over U.S. import tariffs.】

item.title: 前政策制定者称，受美国关税打击影响，日本央行将在 3 月前暂缓加息
item.description: 日本央行前决策者樱井诚（Makoto Sakurai）周三表示，日本央行很可能至少在明年3月之前暂缓再次加息，以评估美国关税可能对经济造成的损害。【原文：The Bank of Japan will likely hold off raising interest rates again until at least next March to assess the damage that U.S. tariffs could inflict on the economy, former central bank policymaker Makoto Sakurai said on Wednesday.】

item.title: -蚂蚁国际 "认真考虑 "稳定币许可证申请
item.description: 一位高管周三表示，总部位于新加坡的金融科技公司蚂蚁国际正在 "认真考虑 "全球多个司法管辖区的稳定币许可证申请。【原文：Singapore-headquartered financial technology company Ant International is "seriously considering" stablecoin license applications in multiple jurisdictions around the world, an executive said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 尽管美国需求下降，大众汽车第二季度交付量仍略有增长
item.description: 德国汽车制造商大众汽车公司周三表示，尽管美国需求下降，但该公司第二季度的汽车交付量仍增长了1.2%，其中纯电动汽车（BEV）的交付量增长了37.6%。【原文：German carmaker Volkswagen saw a 1.2% rise in vehicle deliveries during the second quarter despite a drop in U.S. demand, with all-electric vehicles (BEVs) deliveries up 37.6%, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，安巴尼的 Reliance Jio 推迟印度 IPO，2025 年上市无望
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的人士称，亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）领导的印度电信和数字巨头信实吉奥平台公司（Reliance Jio Platforms）已决定不按计划在今年启动首次公开募股（IPO），从而推迟了该国最令人期待的股票发行之一。【原文：Indian telecom and digital giant Reliance Jio Platforms, led by billionaire Mukesh Ambani, has decided not to launch its IPO this year as planned, delaying one of the country's most anticipated stock offerings, two people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 中国开通汽车制造商供应商付款投诉在线渠道
item.description: 中国工业部周三在网上开通了对汽车制造商承诺及时支付供应商货款的投诉渠道，并表示将与有关方面协调，帮助解决问题。【原文：China's industry ministry on Wednesday opened an online channel for complaints about automakers' pledges to make timely supplier payments, saying it will coordinate with relevant parties to help with solutions.】

item.title: 印尼关税谈判代表将在美国与卢特尼克会面，旨在兜售自然资源
item.description: 印尼一位政府官员周三表示，印尼将强调其在全球贸易中的战略重要性，特别是其自然资源，同时印尼将继续推进谈判，努力降低美国征收的32%的关税。【原文：Indonesia will highlight its strategic importance in global trade, especially its natural resources, as it forges ahead with negotiations to try to reduce a 32% tariff imposed by the United States, a government official said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 泰国准备采取12亿美元措施应对美国关税影响
item.description: 泰国财政部副部长周三表示，泰国正准备采取400多亿泰铢（约合12.2亿美元）的措施来减轻美国关税的影响。【原文：Thailand is preparing more than 40 billion baht ($1.22 billion) in measures to mitigate the impact of U.S. tariffs, a deputy finance minister said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据《德国商报》报道，大众品牌电动汽车上半年销量增长 14
item.description: 据《德国商报》（Handelsblatt）周三报道，大众汽车的核心品牌大众（VW）今年上半年的全球电动汽车销量增长了 14.3%，德国汽车制造商在这一细分市场的欧洲领先地位得到了巩固。【原文：Volkswagen's core VW brand saw global sales volumes of electric vehicles gain 14.3% during the first half of the year as the German carmaker underscores its leading European market position in the segment, Handelsblatt reported on Wednesday.】
